[@Debjit](@G3Zg62f6ZiQtjm+dBIbJtuy2IYFdmx392usFlfXg/qA=.ed25519) No problem!

> So I will have to mention all the people I want to send a message to everytime?

You'll only have to mention them when you're starting a new thread, but otherwise yes. There's currently no way to add someone new to a private group, but there's lots of [exciting work](%xAlzJXkpPcZZhRLRFixVjm6HFeJezhDCkeXfY9ddcQU=.sha256) focused around that use-case. My hope is that eventually we'll be able to select the group to share with when making a new post, but we aren't quite there yet.
